entries.femaleVariant: V, this is important.
Judy's always been there for me. Always helped out. I trust her.
But she's a Mox, not the latest member of your crew. Try not to forget.
So you'll be a good girl, tread lightly and keep that tongue on a leash.
entries.maleVariant: So you'll be a good boy, tread lightly and keep that tongue on a leash.

entries.femaleVariant: Dex had a load to say about you. Called you professional, effective...
I'm good at what I do. Got a solid crew at my back, too. Never once botched a job.
You do realize I expect more of you than scraping streetcorner dataterms? Much, much more.
I'm the best. And I know what I'm getting into. Dex was clear – the job's high-risk.
By the way, you worked together long? You and Dex?
Let's... cut to the chase. Whaddaya got for me?
One more thing. Data that's on the chip – what is it?
Irrelevant. Entirely.
We're talkin' about data Yorinobu snuck out of Arasaka. What's more, he wants to pass it onto NetWatch. Sounds pretty damn relevant to me.
Listen, V. The Relic – that's my concern. Your concern – earning a paycheck.
Just get the job done. I'll make sure your bank accounts're sated.
Your... target – I trust you know what it is?
Relic. "Secure Your Soul" trinket. Key tech in the program, actually.
Mhm, Arasaka's poured billions into personality transfer technology. But me – I just want the data on this one.
The chip is tucked away inside Konpeki Plaza, the hotel. You ever been?
[Stand] OK. What's next?
Yori Arasaka – what else do you know?
What's on this Relic?
OK. What's next?
What else you know about Yorinobu?
Quite a bit, actually. He studied finance and biotech in Tokyo. Hm, probably didn't have a choice in the matter, come to think of it. Saburo was grooming him to be his successor.
Seems to be risking everything with this Relic scam...
Yes, because he's fallen for the biggest lie this town puts forward.
That he can gain and retain control. Of anything.
Let's see this braindance.
Judy'll help. She's a Mox, too. Besides, we go back, uh... years.
I'm the best.
You don't care what Dex thinks.
Let's just cut to the chase.
No. You're here to gain some knowledge, the life-changing kind.
Well, now you got me all excited.
Now comes the best part.
You don't give a rat's dick what Dex thinks. We both know that.
You have trouble accepting compliments?
Name's V.
A big tipper.
Name's V. She and I have a... date.
entries.maleVariant: Name's V. She and I have a, uh... date.

entries.femaleVariant: Well, V, it's a pleasure. I'm Mateo.
Uh-huh... So, Evelyn?
Just answer the damn question.
Seem a little tense, choomba. Go grab a box – might take the edge off.
And? Like what you see?
If I didn't, rest assured... you'd know.
Mind if we talk about the job? Heard you got somethin' for me.
Mhm. But not here. Come with me.
We'll be in the lounge, Mateo. Anyone asks, we're not here.
C'mon. Know a place we can talk where ears won't prick up to listen.
We'll be in the lounge, Mateo. Anyone asks, we're not here.
Why didn't you come over sooner?
Centzon? Only tequila I drink.
Hm. How would you know?
[Sit]
Look, if you've got any spare aces up your sleeve, now's the time to show 'em.
Now, this should make your tits perk up. Yorinobu recently swiped the chip from an Arasaka laboratory. He's made a deal with NetWatch, aims to sell it to them.
entries.maleVariant: Now, this should make your prick perk up. Yorinobu recently swiped the chip from an Arasaka laboratory. He's made a deal with NetWatch, aims to sell it to them.

entries.femaleVariant: [Stand]
And trustworthy.
So what's on the tape?
Yorinobu's suite. The glorious interior.
You'll need to locate the Relic yourself. Hope I grabbed enough detail to make that possible.
Hold up... Mean to say you recorded this?
Sit, sit. We've got a lot to cover.
Let's talk shop, the contract.
Why meet here?
Maybe Dex is beneath you. Have you known each other long?
Just started working with 'im, in fact.
You writin' Dex's bio? Hate to disappoint, but I just don't know much.
I've heard there are two kinds of fixers. Those with stable crews on long contracts and short leashes.
In other words, you hardly know each other... Yet he fingered you for this job. Hm, curious.
Why we meetin' here? Any particular reason?
Actually, doesn't seem much like your thing, this place.
Hm, I'll take that as a compliment.
Yorinobu's got an army around him, I bet.
Seriously, HE's my target? Yorinobu Arasaka?
Top dog like Yorinobu's bound to have an army on call. Hotel's prolly a goddamn fortress by now, too.
Yorinobu keeps exactly no huscle around. Not one guard. Got rid of them a long time ago.
Huh. Why's that?
Surely you know what they say about Arasaka intel?
So we're not jumpin' the corp. We're jumping Yorinobu Arasaka himself.
Eh, Yorinobu is a puppet. He lost all his cards years ago when he failed to do daddy's bidding.
But then Yorinobu vanished to chase his own dreams, cut himself off from the corp for years. Long story short, though the black sheep returned, the bitter taste remained.
It's all right, Mateo. I was waitin' for this one.
Evelyn Parker.
I knew it was you as soon as you walked in.
Why not say hello sooner?
I like to know everything about the people I work with.
Either that or it was just a lucky guess.
I wanted to get a good look at you first.
And? Like what you see?
Let's talk business.
Why're we meeting here?
I hope he wasn't overselling...
Loyalty and predictability they value above all else. Then there's the other kind – Dex's kind.
Nope. Outta my price range.
I'm familiar with the franchise.
Never had the opportunity.
Classy corp hotels? Mm, yeah, no. Outta my price range.
entries.maleVariant: Classy corp hotels? Yeah, no. Outta my price range.

entries.femaleVariant: Hm. The decor's to die for. As you'll see for yourself.
The two are identical to each other.
Y'know, just never rolled through that neighborhood.
Damn shame. The fresh they serve is sinfully good. Chef must've made a deal with the devil.
So where's this chip hiding, exactly?
In a suite on the top floor. The room's occupied by Yorinobu Arasaka.
Let's see what's up your sleeve.
Where does Yorinobu keep the Relic?
NetWatch? Something doesn't add up.
Fine, so no Arasaka security on the device 'cause Yorinobu whisked it away in secret. Now, where's he hidin' it?
And the case is...?
Risky move with the biochip.
Maybe he's just got a taste for power?
Could be another power-hungry corpodick. Like so many others.
entries.maleVariant: Could just be another power-hungry corpodick. Like so many others.

entries.femaleVariant: Hm. Ever tried to imagine what life might be like for an emperor's son?
You have everything, yet you are no one, nothing. At least as long as you remain in Saburo Arasaka's shadow.
I... sympathize. It's a vulnerability I understand well.
And one you plan to exploit fully.
NetWatch provides net security for all corporations. And collects eddies in the millions for it.
Likely in a specialized container, one that mimics an organic neural environment. On the outside, it looks like an ordinary briefcase.
And if something goes south – got a backup plan?
Afraid Plan A is all we got. It HAS to work.
Answer the question.
A big tipper. Generous when I get the answers I'm lookin' for.
Have fun, relax, find me once your mood's improved. Serve you a drink, then.
Appreciate the gesture, truly.
But, afraid I don't get paid to talk. Opposite, actually.
Club's big. Gonna have to look around. Can't do it for you.
You'll see for yourself soon enough. Provided we're done gossiping about the Arasakas.
Saburo's had Yori's balls in a vise for years. He might just turn the screw and crush them outright if he learns his son's up to no good again.
Sneeze in Night City and a blossom drops from a cherry tree in Tokyo. Yorinobu was convinced his Arasaka security detail reported directly to his father.
But that's only one side of him. There's another – an intelligent man who has always walked his own path and so has his own designs on the corp.
Mmmhm.
Follow me.
Got somethin' for ya. Should help you plan. Braindance from Konpeki Plaza.
How's a braindance supposed to help? Need facts, not thrills.
Think BDs are only good for fondling virtual tits, jackin' off to in those boxes?
No. They can be a very useful tool. Good for analyzing details human perception, even boosted, doesn't grasp. Exactly what you need.
Supposed to be Yorinobu's pad on the tape. Means you were inside. You, uh, know each other?
entries.maleVariant: Supposed to be Yorinobu's pad on the tape. Means you were inside. You know each other?

entries.femaleVariant: How else could I get all this intel? I know him pretty well, actually.
We have an arrangement. Strictly business. Suits us both, I think.
In you go.
I'm waiting.
Uhh, V?
But... in this day and age, everyone's in the game, and no one can afford to be a saint. To win, one has to go all in.
Yorinobu Arasaka... in Night City? Huh, guess the screamsheets weren't lyin' this time.
entries.maleVariant: Yorinobu Arasaka...? In Night City? Heh, guess the screamsheets weren't lyin' this time.

entries.femaleVariant: Yorinobu Arasaka? He's in town?
Don't you read the screamsheets? The media couldn't get enough of Yori coming to Night City, it was all over the headlines.
Only a handful of people in Night City know what the Arasakas' real plans are.
Tellin' me you're one of 'em?
Anyway, he's heir apparent to the Arasaka empire – Saburo Arasaka's only surviving son.
It's on the lips of everyone in the city. Saburo Arasaka's only surviving son, heir apparent to the Arasaka empire in town? Hm, please.
Mhm. BD rec implant. Why, you object?
[Drink] Mmm. My tequila of choice.
Let's just talk biz.
The other kind? Elaborate, please.
C'mon, can't leave that hangin'.
Headhunters. They lay their trust elsewhere, not in people but in a thing – their intuition. They bet on potential. And if they lose that bet...
It's the last mistake they ever make.
I'm hoping Dex's intuition has served him well in this case.
Let's talk business.
Got any doubts, ring Dex.
Shit, buzz Dex right now if you're gettin' cold feet – I can wait.
I doubt he'd add anything I haven't already heard. Anything I'd really like to hear, for that matter.
There's only one other bunch that's worse than fixers in that respect – used car salesmen. I'll go with my gut for now.
No. Just think flattery's beneath you. Am I wrong?
Let's talk biz. I mean, it's nice, but I didn't come here to get my ego stroked.
Arasaka seems to have quite the touch with that hotel chain, but I gotta say, Konpeki in Tokyo's still leagues above the rest.
Japan's staff, heh, the service can't be beat. Singapore, Paris, Washington... ugh, all the rest act like charity-case cousins by comparison.
entries.maleVariant: Japan's staff, huh, the service can't be beat. Singapore, Paris, Washington... all the rest act like charity-case cousins by comparison.

entries.femaleVariant: Well, it's hard to argue with that, true.
Have you spotted my ace yet or do I need to spell things out?
Just started working with him.
What, you writing Dex's bio?
Let's get down to biz.
Don't know him well. Haven't worked together long.
No idea if Dex exaggerates. A little, a lot – you got me.
entries.maleVariant: No idea if Dex exaggerates. A little, a lot – ya got me.

entries.femaleVariant: Who's asking?
Relax. Believe it or not, I'm no stranger to tact, in biz or life.
entries.maleVariant: Relax. Believe it or not, I'm no stranger to tact. In biz or life.

entries.femaleVariant: We're tangling with Arasaka. Makin' this heist one dangerous, risky motherfucker.
So what's Yorinobu slated to get in return?
So what's Yorinobu due to walk away with?
Unimportant. You focus on the biochip.
What could cyberspace's watchers and protectors offer him? Intelligence on his enemies?
That doesn't matter in the least. Because you'll make sure the transaction never happens, and I get the chip.
Nope, don't buy it. NetWatch's integrity rests on their neutrality. Why would they tarnish their rep by procuring stolen goods?
Wait – neutral NetWatch is mixed up in this?
So you know Yorinobu personally?
No, no objections.
No, not at all.
Could it be? Emperor's prepared to cede his throne after a hundred and fifty years? Doubt it.
What, so Arasaka Junior's plannin' to grab the reins while in Night City?
Even so... it's still Yorinobu-fucking-Arasaka.
Heard a few things about Yorinobu.
Heard a bit about Yorinobu. Studied finance and biotech in Tokyo, prob'ly to please his father.
entries.maleVariant: Heard a bit about Yorinobu. Studied finance and biotech in Tokyo, prolly to please his father.

entries.femaleVariant: Mhm. Saburo was grooming him to be his successor.
But then Yorinobu cut himself off from the corp. Joined the Steel Dragons, nomads from Tokyo. Heard they were plannin' an Arasaka coup, or its downfall.
entries.maleVariant: But then Yorinobu cut himself off from the corp. Joined the Steel Dragons, nomads from Tokyo. Heard they were planning an Arasaka coup, or its downfall.

entries.femaleVariant: Mhh. That flash of youthful rebellion ended like it usually does – Yorinobu returned to the fold, but the bitter taste remained.
You know your stuff. But that's only one side of him. There's another – an intelligent man who has his own designs on the corp.
